title: Verglas
description: You don't play Salts for fun.You play to bleed.Emerson DuncanMy sister, my rival, my coach, and my pair…None of them want me to win.But I was born from nothing and I’ve clawed my way to the top. I’m not backing down, even if I have to break bones and spill blood in the snow to stay the first round pick for the Royal Salts League.Electra St. ClairEmerson Duncan is unhinged, but I love watching him squirm.Victor Fell is quiet and cunning and, I find outthe night he turns my world upside down, sexy as hell.But… who am I?What do I want?To play for the RSL?Write for the paper?Escape my stepbrother?Fall in love with my coach?Maybe I’m not that good, though.Maybe I don’t deserve any of those things.Maybe I’m as bad as Em, and all I really want is to watch the snow turn red.*Verglas is a full-length novel. It can be read as a stand-alone, but this is not exactly a romance.*
author: K.V. Rose
